title: 神秘时代4如何修改注魔材料以及要素
author: Reall
txt_content: 如题，我需要应用在服务器魔改中

replies.author: 时透无一年
replies.txt_content:
Reall 发表于 2016-9-23 17:59
还有植物魔法花药台的语句也能顺便告诉我一下嘛~感激不尽
花药台
mods.botania.Apothecary.removeRecipe(要移除的物品);
mods.botania.Apothecary.addRecipe(物品,[配方]);
注魔
mods.thaumcraft.Infusion.addRecipe("搜索字段", 被注魔物品, [配方], "要素", 产物, 不稳定性);
mods.thaumcraft.Infusion.removeRecipe(要移除的物品);
注魔举个例子，取自infinity
mods.thaumcraft.Infusion.addRecipe("ARCANEBORE", <Thaumcraft:blockWoodenDevice:6>, [<AWWayofTime:bloodSocket>, <AWWayofTime:bloodSocket>, <Botania:manaResource:4>, <Botania:manaResource:4>, <AWWayofTime:boundPickaxe>, <AWWayofTime:boundShovel>, <witchery:ingredient:39>, <witchery:ingredient:80>], "perfodio 32, machina 32, potentia 16, vacuos 16, motus 16", <Thaumcraft:blockWoodenDevice:4>, 5);复制代码
要查询要素名字的话输入/minetweaker aspectList
顺便神秘时代和植物魔法的支持还需要装个modtweaker
搬运：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-306970-1-1.html (貌似没人搬，里面有下载地址)
wiki：http://minetweaker3.powerofbytes.com/wiki/ModTweaker
求个最佳，谢谢

replies.author: 时透无一年
replies.txt_content: http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=561530  使用MT可以修改，具体改法详见官网wiki，如果需要的话我放学回家可以提供下神秘修改语句
